definition: to be informed of a case/to take a case/to contract for a job (as a freelancer)
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: For me, just being able to pick the exact case I want makes the process worthwhile.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，確實是可以接案的過程，我想作有意義。

definition: to report a case to the authorities
to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
to dispatch police to the scene of crime, accident etc
(of police, fire brigade etc) to receive a report of an incident
to solve a case/shabby old table
to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
